result.execSummary:
The defendant Kelly O. Puntillo was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Kelly O. Puntillo is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Kelly O. Puntillo was found guilty of Lewd, Lascivious Behavior-Exposure, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 944.20(1)(b).
  • Kelly O. Puntillo was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
11:20 am - 11:45 am Defendant Kelly O. Puntillo in court with attorney Brian Severson.  Brenda L. Yaskal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases heard: 14CF323, 15CF163 & 14TR4993R.  Defendant pleads guilty to count 1 in 14CF323 & no contest in count 1 & count 3 in 15CF163.  Court adjudged guilty of these counts and enters JOC.  Court imposes in 14CF323: count 1 of the information: 4 1/2 years prison with 18 months initial  & 3 years extended supervision, $3214.00, 36 month revocation & IID, $39.00 blood draw, AODA & treatment, DNA sample and $250.00 surcharge.  Count 2 dismissed. Defendant eligible for Substance Abuse program, not eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program.  Sentence to commence forthwith.

 In 15CF163 Count 1 of the information: 90 days jail with huber concurrent to 14CF323, $243.00 costs, Count 2: s/w/h 2 years probation consecutive to prison term in count 1 in 14CF323, costs of $518.00, AODA & treatment, DNA sample, no contact with EJP, not to be at the Columbus hospital unless life threatening.   Dismiss count 3 & 4 and 14TR4993R.   Jail credit to  be determined.
filed by Atty Kohlwey for Atty Cross

Defendant Kelly O. Puntillo in court with attorney Brian Severson.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waiver of Right to Prelim filed, Court accepts Waiver, probable cause found, bound over, Information filed, waives reading, not guilty pleas entered, matter to be set for jury trial, bond cont'd
and Notice of DNA and Witness List with Petition for Leave to file Additional Motions filed by ADA Cross
standard felony conditions, absolute sobriety, not initiate any contact w/nurse from Columbus Hospital E.J.P.

Defendant Kelly O. Puntillo in court, in custody by video with attorney Alicia M. Nall.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. waives reading of complaint, right to atty recited, $50.00 cash bond, standard felony conditions, absolute sobriety, not initiate any contact w/nurse from Columbus Hospital E.J.P., waives time limits to prelim,  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 15, 2015 at 03:50 pm.  Return date scheduled for July 1, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
